name: Kiwanuka
summary: Kiwanuka is a puzzle platformer for iOS and Android in which the player must guide a group of refugees through a landscape of fractals and dubstep.
info:
• 中文名: 拯救基瓦努卡
  • 别名: KIWANUKA
  • 平台: iOS
  • 平台: Android
  • 游戏类型: Platformer
  • 发行日期: MAY 8, 2014
  • 官方网站: http://cmamegacorp.com/
  • 开发: CMA Megacorp
  • 发行: CMA Megacorp
